statements: SELECT account_number, balance, transaction_history FROM customer_accounts;
SELECT balance, transaction_history, account_number FROM customer_accounts;
SELECT * FROM customer_accounts WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT account_number, balance FROM customer_accounts WHERE balance < 500;
SELECT * FROM customer_accounts ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_accounts WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY account_number DESC;
SELECT account_number, balance FROM customer_accounts WHERE balance < 500 ORDER BY balance ASC;
SELECT account_number, transaction_history -> 'date' AS transaction_date FROM customer_accounts WHERE transaction_history -> 'amount' > 200 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;

SELECT account_number, balance, jsonb_array_length(transaction_history -> 'details') AS num_of_transactions FROM customer_accounts WHERE jsonb_array_length(transaction_history -> 'details') >= 5 ORDER BY num_of_transactions DESC, balance ASC;
SELECT COUNT(account_number) AS total_accounts, SUM(balance) AS total_balance FROM customer_accounts;
SELECT * FROM customer_accounts;
SELECT account_number, balance FROM customer_accounts ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT account_number, balance FROM customer_accounts WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customer_details WHERE customer_name = 'Alice';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer_details ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer_details WHERE customer_name IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM customer_accounts WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT customer_name, account_number FROM customer_details JOIN customer_accounts ON customer_details.customer_id = customer_accounts.account_number;
SELECT * FROM customer_details WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%';
SELECT account_number, transaction_history->'timestamp' AS last_transaction FROM customer_accounts ORDER BY last_transaction DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, balance FROM customers ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT customer_name, balance FROM customers WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM customers c JOIN transactions t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT th.description, t.amount, th.timestamp FROM transactions t JOIN transaction_history th ON t.transaction_id = th.transaction_id ORDER BY th.timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, balance FROM customers WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, amount FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id;
SELECT transaction_date, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 500 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;

SELECT customer_name, description, timestamp FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id JOIN transaction_history ON transactions.transaction_id = transaction_history.transaction_id WHERE customer_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM account_info ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT account_number, balance FROM account_info WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customer_info ORDER BY customer_id;
SELECT account_number, customer_id FROM account_mapping WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM account_info WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT account_number, balance, customer_id FROM account_info WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customer_info WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT a.account_number, a.balance, c.first_name, c.last_name FROM account_info a JOIN customer_info c ON a.customer_id = c.customer_id;

SELECT a.account_number, t.amount, t.transaction_date, t.transaction_type FROM account_info a, transaction_history t WHERE a.account_number = t.account_number AND t.amount > 500 ORDER BY t.transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, balance FROM customers;
SELECT account_number, account_type FROM accounts ORDER BY open_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_date, amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE balance > 5000 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, account_number, balance FROM customers INNER JOIN accounts ON customers.customer_id = accounts.customer_id WHERE account_type = 'Savings';

SELECT customers.customer_name, transactions.amount, account_history.transaction_type FROM customers INNER JOIN accounts ON customers.customer_id = accounts.customer_id INNER JOIN transactions ON accounts.account_number = transactions.account_number INNER JOIN account_history ON transactions.transaction_id = account_history.transaction_id WHERE customers.customer_id = 101;
SELECT account_number, sum(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY account_number HAVING total_amount > 10000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;

SELECT customer_name, account_number, transaction_date FROM customers, transactions WHERE customers.customer_id = accounts.customer_id AND transactions.account_number = accounts.account_number ORDER BY transaction_date;
